panels.description:
### MRs/PRs Throughput 

A count of how many pull requests are merged over a period of time.
panels.title: MRs/PRs Throughput

panels.description:
### MRs/PRs Rates

This is the ratio of product MRs authored by team members in Development Department to the number of team members in the Development Department.
panels.title: MRs/PRs Rates

panels.description:
### MRs/PRs Size

The number of lines of code that were added, changed or removed.
panels.title: MRs/PRs Size Counts for $repository (this month)
Cycle Time by MRs/PRs for $repository (last 30 days)
